name: quick-web-app-template
description: This is a web app based tool for modifying my GCal faster, for blazingly fast week planning xD

scripts.docker-build-run: docker build -t quick-web-app-template . && docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -p 8080:8080 --name quick-web-app-template-container quick-web-app-template
scripts.docker-update: docker stop quick-web-app-template-container && docker rm quick-web-app-template-container && docker image rm quick-web-app-template && docker build -t quick-web-app-template . && docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -p 8080:8080 --name quick-web-app-template-container quick-web-app-template

author: Kyle Klus
